hero_desc: Connect your car to the cloud. We provide real-time diagnostics for drivers and automated client management for workshops.
benefits_desc: Whether you drive or fix cars, SafeCar creates value for you.
benefit_1_desc: Anticipate breakdowns. Receive notifications on your phone before the engine fails.
benefit_3_desc: Preventive maintenance is 50% cheaper than emergency repairs.
benefit_2_desc: See the car's health data before the client arrives at your shop.
benefit_retention_desc: Automated appointment scheduling keeps your bays full.
plans_subtitle: Boost your garage efficiency. Choose a plan based on your team size.
about_desc: SafeCar integrates an IoT OBD-II device with a cloud platform. The device reads the ECU parameters and sends them to our AI engine.
testimonial_driver: SafeCar alerted me about an engine overheat 2 days before a long trip. It saved my vacation!
testimonial_mechanic: Since using SafeCar, we receive cars with the diagnosis already made. Our efficiency improved by 40%.
contact_subtitle: Have questions? We are here to help.
name: Name
